title: Artist Talk: Wu Tsang
hero_caption: <p>Wu Tsang. Installation view of <em>We Hold where study</em>, 2017, Kunsthalle Münster. Photo by Roman Mensing. Courtesy of the artist and Galerie Isabella  …
short_description: Presented by the Society for Contemporary Art
list_description: Presented by the Society for Contemporary Art
description:
Wu Tsang (born 1982) is a performance artist and award-winning filmmaker whose practice considers intersections, overlaps, and conflicts of identity and community. Working both independently and with frequent collaborators such as poet Fred Moten and performance artist boychild, Tsang intertwines documentary practice and narrative fiction into critical analyses of hegemonic structures and explorations of nonconformity within queer and transgender communities.

Presented by the Society for Contemporary Art
